input.sentences: father and son out for a beer .
both daughters were there for dinner .
the younger daughter brought her guy along .
the boys had a good talk | although the tvs were distracting .
their mom took this picture of the girls .
output.sentences: The son had fun drinking beer with his father.
He also enjoyed dinner with his daughter.
The guy made sure to bring his daughter.
They found the talk on the TVs distracting.
Mom wanted to get a picture with the girls.
